name: macd_crossover_down
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool barpatterns.
Tool description: Screener for stock candlestick patterns & indicator signals. 
Screening 21 candlestick patterns & 6 indicator signals (supertrend, macd, rsi)
API description: Fetches a list of stocks having a MACD crossover down signal from the provided API.

page.description: The page number of the results to fetch. Default is 1.
